name: Seybul Tech
description:
Seybul Tech lures you into a voyage through a realm in-between, where unsettling artistry, haunting ambiance, and unique melodies meld together. Navigating these unconventional passages, each step further enhances the uncanny atmosphere.

FEATURES

  • This game is basically a walking simulator
  • Liminal space design of scenes to explore - extremely odd layouts designed to instill familiarity and discomfort
  • Every scene hand-crafted with an extreme attention to lighting
  • Interact with limited 90s tech such as PCs, TVs, etc.
  • Original soundtrack
  • This game is meant to be explored, so runtime will depend on just that with a minimum runtime of 1 hour

GAMEPLAY

Beginning in a dimly-lit office, you are faced with a strange encounter that leaves you no choice but to delve deeper into this surreal world.
